ALLOWED_DOMAINS.description: Google email domains that are allowed access. Enter multiple domains as example.com,example.org

GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID.description: Google Application OAuth 2.0 Client ID, found in https://console.developers.google.com/apis/credentials

GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Client Secret for given Client ID

SESSION_SECRET.description: A random string for signing session cookies

AUTHORITY.description: Authority under which the site will be accessible (used to generate Google OAuth callbacks)

HOSTPROTOCOL.description: `http` or `https`. If `https`, all HTTP traffic will be redirected to HTTPS
